oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tommy Sosebee Show - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition for WSM program the Tommy Sosebee Show, featuring Tommy Sosebee, the Anita Kerr Singers, and Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones, with announcer Dave Overton. Sponsored by Colgate-Palmolive-Peet products Ajax, Vel, and Veto. Date is based on information on sleeve and is unconfirmed. See also TR001311.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tommy Sosebee; Anita Kerr Singers; Owen Bradley; Vel-Tones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Vel jingle -- Ajax jingle -- Veto jingle -- Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Crawdad Song (Tommy Sosebee) -- Opening statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- Vel jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Vel commercial (Dave Overton, Anita Kerr) -- Vel jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Tommy Sosebee introduces the Anita Kerr Singers -- It's My Lazy Day (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Tommy Sosebee talks -- Love Me (Tommy Sosebee) -- Ajax jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Ajax commercial (Dave Overton) -- Ajax jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Tommy Sosebee introduces Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones -- Bye Bye Blues (Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones) -- Veto jingle (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr) -- Veto commercial (Dave Overton) -- Veto jingle (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr) -- Tommy Sosebee talks -- God Has One More Angel [title unconfirmed] (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Vel jingle -- Ajax jingle -- Veto jingle -- Closing statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
